name: Spirit Trap
description:
Spirit Trap is a game where you have to colour orbs and bring them to the centre of the screen, using your hands. See all the beautiful bodies we can produce for humans and demons. Watch that guy's beatiful smile. And enjoy our relaxing music for playing.

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2016, at SAE Institute, Haggerston, London, UK, by Ciro Duran, Wittawat Keawcharoen, Eli Menendez, James Sampson and Oscar Webster Bell.
